item1:
代码维护
Maintenance of code data
item2:
由使用者自行设定所需要的数据
Set the required data by the user
item4:
系统开发前期已确认代码数据
Confirmed code data in the early stage of system development
item5:
代码类型、代码、代码排序、代码名称
Code type, code no., code order, code name
item6:
代码数据、更新代码档
Code data, update code data
item7:
如果无符合条件的代码数据，系统将提示查无此代码信息
If there is no code data that meets the requirements, the system will prompt to find no such code information
item8:
1. 输入查询条件后点选Query查询代码数据
Enter query conditions and click Query to query code data
